image_analysis.purpose: AI training dataset for Sweet Robo manual assistant

images.description: Stylized marketing graphic showing the Robo Ice Cream machine front view with customer interface screen and LED display on purple gradient background
images.ai_training_notes: Good for identifying machine exterior, customer-facing interface, branding elements

images.description: External components diagram with clear labels for LED signage, touch screen, viewing window, coin acceptor, bill acceptor, credit card reader, and collection door
images.ai_training_notes: Excellent for teaching component identification, perfect labeling example
images.text_content: LED Signage, Touch Screen, Viewing Window, Coin Acceptor, Bill Acceptor, Credit Card Reader, Collection Door

images.description: Internal view showing F2's dual ice cream hoppers, timer, breaker, power switches, cup holder/dispenser, syrup holders, topping dispensers, UV sanitizer, and Blue Robo delivery bot with detailed labels
images.ai_training_notes: Critical for F2 identification - shows dual hopper system that distinguishes F2 from F1. Excellent for technical training.
images.text_content: Timer, Breaker/Power SW, Main IO Power SW, Cup Holder/Dispenser, Ice Cream Hoppers, Syrup Holders, Topping Holders, Topping Dispenser, UV Sanitizer, Syrup Dispenser, Ice Cream Dispenser, Blue Robo - Delivery Bot

images.description: Three orange ice cream serving cups with Sweet Robo branding and cute character designs. NOT related to unpacking/installation.
images.ai_training_notes: WRONG PLACEMENT - This shows consumable cups, not unpacking steps. Should be in operation or supplies section.

images.description: Cleaning supplies including blue bottle brush, wire whisk, and blue cleaning cloths. NOT related to unpacking/installation.
images.ai_training_notes: WRONG PLACEMENT - These are cleaning/maintenance supplies, not unpacking steps. Should be in maintenance section.

images.description: 10-liter transparent measuring bucket with graduated markings (2L to 10L) used for mixing ice cream preparations. NOT related to unpacking/installation.
images.ai_training_notes: WRONG PLACEMENT - This is a mixing bucket for ice cream preparation, not unpacking. Should be in maintenance/mix preparation section.

images.description: 3D stylized 'ROBO ice cream' text graphic with ice cream cone on purple background. NOT showing backend access position.
images.ai_training_notes: WRONG PLACEMENT - This is marketing/branding material, not operational instructions for backend access.

key_learning_points: F2 has dual hoppers vs F1 single hopper - critical distinguishing feature
External component diagrams are excellent for component identification training
Image placement accuracy is crucial for manual usability
Sweet Robo uses consistent orange/purple branding
Cleaning supplies and consumables are often confused with setup materials
common_misidentification_risks: Cleaning supplies mistaken for installation tools
Marketing graphics vs technical diagrams distinction needed
